ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR( ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName , "Develop Opportunity"), ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName , "Create Offer (Bid)"), ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName , "Win the Case (Negotiate)"), ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName , "Handover (Prepare for Delivery)") ), ISCHANGED( Questionnaire_Label__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Questionnaire Label is fixed and cannot be changed.
